item.title: Living with ADHD: My Diagnosis Story and Self-Medication Journey
item.description:
There was this now deleted Reddit post in r/Cebu asking, “To those diagnosed with ADHD - how was your experience?” and here was my take on it.

There’s this thing on Instagram Reels called AuDHD (Autism/ADHD), and I relate to most of what they are saying. I knew something was wrong with me, and I was experiencing a lot at that time with my tech job in Cebuâ€”limerence, seasonal depression, stress from toxic clients, anxiety, inability to concentrate (more than usual), malaise, etc. It’s a good thing my company offers a refund for medical services. I asked my TM if psychological services were included, and I got the approval.
